name: Mushroom Rushroom
description:
Two Players Required

There is music it's just super quiet!

A fast paced arcade local co-op versus game.

Fight against your friend to collect mushrooms.

When you are bigger than your friend you can eat them!

Instructions

Press space to pause at any time.

WASD and Arrow keys to move, E and Enter to eat the other player when you are bigger than them.

A gamepad may work for both players though I could only get it working for player B.

Made in about 8 hours of development using:

  • Godot
  • Affinity Designer
  • LMMS
